title: Nothing Left To Give
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Akon & Lionel Richie]
I walk the land
And released all the weight on my shoulders
And I sailed the seas
And watched all of my dreams come true
I flew the sky
And seen everything from a bird's view
And I rode the streets
And reality brought me back to you
[Pre-Chorus: Lionel Richie]
That's when I realized that we got to be alive
Yeah and party like there's nothing left to give
[Chorus: Lionel Richie & 
Akon
] x2
Yeah
, it's nothing, 
yeah
, there's nothing
Yeah
, party like there's nothing left to give
[Verse 2: Lionel]
Can you imagine going through life so crazy?
So busy, don't have time to be with your baby
Need to go out and enjoy this nightlife to save me
I been feeling oh so good about how things going lately
[Pre-Chorus]
That's when I realized that we got to be alive
Yeah and party like there's nothing left to give

[Chorus: Lionel Richie & 
Akon
] x4
Yeah
, it's nothing, 
yeah
, there's nothing
Yeah
, party like there's nothing left to give
[Bridge: Lionel Richie]
People to the left hey, people to the right hey
If you going through some things in life
Just know it's gone be alright
Now all my fellas to the left, hey
Ladies to the right, hey
[Chorus: Lionel Richie & 
Akon
]
So can you give it all to me, 
ah ha
So can you give it all to me, 
ah ha
Want to feel your energy, 
oh yeah
Want to see you rock with me, 
oh yeah
[Chorus: Lionel Richie & 
Akon
] x2
Yeah
, it's nothing, 
yeah
, there's nothing
Yeah
, party like there's nothing left to give
[Outro]
Party like there's nothing left to give
